description:
Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy`s loose lips get them into trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!
Eine Bedrohung erscheint – Jack von der Bestien-Piratenbande!
Une menace s`abat. Jack des pirates aux cent bêtes !
Опасное вторжение! Джек из команды Царя Зверей!
脅威襲来 百獣海賊団ジャック!
